data.message: Make "Most Recent" the default or only news feed. The app and web version of FB is a joke.

replies.message: Hi Jeff. We appreciate your feedback about the Most Recent setting and are working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone's Facebook experience. If there is anything else that would make your experience more enjoyable please let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1kIQqKh - Kristen

I agree!  Also, it is super-annoying when your newsfeed is set for most recent, yet just because someone comments on a status, you have to see it over and over again.  Doesn't make sense.  Once I see a status, that is enough.  If I am commenting on it, then the notifications let me know there are more comments.

Oh Facebook we do give you feedback, we give you soo much feedback and you don't listen. Quite on the contrary every update gets worse and worse and someday I'll leave the site behind entirely because everything I ever used it for has been ruined....
but no your not trying to improve things for every one. Everyone has stated that we want top stories deleted but you wont listen

bet you a dollar they wont respond any further to this string of thread and hope we will just shut up and go away. They pretend to be doping us a favor and act like they are concerned, but they dont give a rats A** about us or what we want

Facebook, You DON"T ANSWER your feedbacks!! Why send one?? You took down a DISASTER RELIEF page just because YOU thought we're a business. We are NOT a business!!!! We are VOLUNTEERS who go help clear debris and donate items to families who have lost everything to tornadoes. Why did you take our page down without warning us???
Why is Facebook not answering us about the Bikers United Relief Team's original page? Please look into this!!!
FAIL. LOL!!!!!!! Who ever runs this page, show it to Suckleturd and tell him his site is now a joke.....
I want my own Facebook back
